subject: Baseball
Steroids
Decisions and Verdicts
Doping (Sports)
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds avoided a prison term on Friday when he was sentenced to 30 days’ house arrest and probation for providing evasive testimony to a federal grand jury eight years ago.
snippet: Barry Bonds avoided a prison term on Friday when he was sentenced to 30 days’ house arrest and probation for providing evasive testimony to a federal grand jury eight years ago.
